attributes.action: to start rewarding children who constantly behave well
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in this day and age all the government can do to stop bad behavour is to give things to these badly bahaved children when they do something good. But what about the chilren who are always or mostly behaving if the government wont reward them then whats in it for them to carry on behaving.
so start rewarding the good pupils and the other will follow suit
